definition: To transmit a condition, typically an illness or infection, from one person to another through direct contact or close proximity. This term is commonly used when referring to the spread of contagious diseases or viruses.

examples.german: Ich stecke mir eine Maske an.
Er hat mich mit seiner Begeisterung angesteckt.
examples.english: He infected me with his enthusiasm.

examples.german: Sie steckte ihre Kollegen mit ihrer guten Laune an.
examples.english: She infected her colleagues with her good mood.
